text_block_list.text: After achieving her first victory as a member of team <Sirius>, Silence Suzuka's breakthrough began-

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: She's escaping again today! Silence Suzuka won't give up the lead! The others are increasing their speed but still can't keep up!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Escape and escape, then at the end pull farther away! "Escape and Follow Through" Silence Suzuka, wins her second consecutive Major!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Haa… haa… fuu…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Haa… fuu… fuee…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hiii… S-seriously trying to keep up with Suzuka's speed is roooough~!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Then again, if you go at your own pace, she'll gradually pull away, and at the end you won't be able to catch up~ Mumumuuuu~…!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Again!! Let's run it again!! Let's gooo Suzuka, and Spe-chan!!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yeah, you got it.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ueeeee?! Can't we at least take a 5 minute break?!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: From the start she just runs and runs, and then pulls away at the end. Silence Suzuka's one crazy Uma Musume, isn't she…?!

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text: I'm looking forward to the next one! I keep wondering how the next race will turn out!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Lately, Suzuka's been gettin' an insane amount of attention, huh?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Winning Majors consecutively is impressive by itself, but the way she does it is also awe-inspiring.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes… it's no ordinary "Escape" that Suzuka has.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Just like there are various individual personalities, we Uma Musume have several different individualities when it comes to our running style.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: For me, my strengths are my stamina, ability to adjust on-the-fly, and being able to quickly get in to a good position. It's a royal road pattern-

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Brian-san can use her explosive leg power for a long time, so during the middle, she'll hold back. When she reaches the last straight, she'll aggressively push through everyone.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Rice-san will convert the stamina she's saved into a Long Spurt to shutout and eventually wear down her rivals.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: We've each settled on a style that is adapted to our abilities, and we investigate it thoroughly to make it our best chance at winning.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: That being the case, Suzuka-san's style would be one that many consider the ideal. But everyone else that tried it, could only say it was impossible-
Using that incredible speed from the start to pull away, and continuing to the goal just like that, sounds like a dream-like running style.
Using that incredible speed from the start to pull away, and continuing to the goal just like that, sounds like a dream-like running style.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: But, that dream-like style is actually being used by Suzuka, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I want to see more and more of it from now on. Suzuka's running style that you can't help but think is a dream…!
Silence Suzuka's running style. Not only the fans, but even the Uma Musume are taking notice of that dream-like style.
In the same way that she's pursuing that "scenery", everyone else wishes to see her one-of-a-kind running style.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, pardon the intrusion.
What's up? Did you forget something?
What's wrong? Did you forget something?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: No, I was just wondering if my next race has been decided yet. I thought it would be fine to ask you about it.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I thought if I knew what my next race was, I could decide on what my next training goal would be. Other than that… maybe there'd be some merit to it?
For Silence Suzuka herself to proactively consult me about races is pretty rare.
This might be another sign of just how content she is with her running.
Next, I'm thinking of having you enter the [Kinko Sho].
Next, I'm thinking of having you enter the [Kinko Sho].

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: [Kinko Sho]…is a 2000m race, right?
Yeah, but for someone like Suzuka who runs at top speed from the start, the extended distance might make you a bit uneasy.
Yeah, but for someone like Suzuka who runs at top speed from the start, the extended distance might make you a bit uneasy.
But, with the way you are now, Suzuka, I don't think it's impossible. I believe if it's you, you can definitely handle middle distance races.
But, with the way you are now, Suzuka, I don't think it's impossible. I believe if it's you, you can definitely handle middle distance races.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: If Trainer-san says it that way, then there's no reason for me to feel uneasy.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Besides, as a way to confirm whether my running style is suitable, I think it's the perfect chance.
Got it, your physical and mental condition are improving so lets keep on challenging new things!
If you get results here, the middle distance G1's [Takarazuka Kinen] and [Fall Tenno Sho] won't be out of reach either!
If you get results here, the middle distance G1's [Takarazuka Kinen] and [Fall Tenno Sho] won't be out of reach either!
But in return, from now on, the training will be that much harder.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Fufuu… that's fine.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san. I want to keep exploring the possibilities of this running style.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ahead on this untrodden path, there must be lots of beautiful "scenery", don't you think?
You have my full support. Seeing you taking hold of your dreams, is where my dreams lie as well.
You have my full support. Seeing you taking hold of your dreams, is where my dreams lie as well.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I will do my very best. So both of us… can see that "scenery".
